headline.main: FREER REIN GIVEN JEFFERS BY NELSON; WPB Chairman Lets Rubber Chief Report to Him Only, Instead of to Wilson BOWS TO JEFFERS DEMAND Directive of Feb. 18 Revised -- Smaller War Plants Division Asks Same Status

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 1 -- Acting at the insistence of William M. Jeffers, his rubber director, Donald M. Nelson, War Production Board chairman, today amended his original order which provided that Mr. Jeffers, along with other WPB heads, report direct to Charles E. Wilson, recently appointed executive vice chairman of the WPB.
abstract: US supply: Jeffers obtains WPB directive to rept direct to Nelson; C E Wilson retains raw materials and component parts scheduling
